predicate.note: Frames file for 'commence' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 55.1, other framed members include begin, proceed and resume. Probably start, too. Comparison with start.

roleset.name: begin

example.name: from the corpus
example.text: It includes *trace* removing $242 million in good will from the books, issuing $150 million in preferred stock and commencing an exchange offer for $52 million in convertible bonds.
example.arg: an exchange offer for $52 million in convertible bonds

roleset.note: Refer to 'start' or 'begin' for examples with (ie) instrumental subjects or secondary predication.
